channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: TikTok Awards 2025: Live updates from the red carpet, winners list, performances, and more
item.description: Creators take center stage as TikTok turns its FYP into a live awards show — follow along for real-time updates all night.

item.title: NYT Connections hints today: Clues, answers for December 18, 2025
item.description: Connections is a New York Times word game that's all about finding the "common threads between words." How to solve the puzzle.

item.title: Microsoft AI CEO admits Gemini 'can do things that Copilot can’t do'
item.description: Microsoft’s AI head openly acknowledged Gemini 3’s strengths while outlining a broader vision to turn Copilot into a more practical, ever-present digital assistant.
